messages.title: Scrap Universal Credit
messages.content: Universal Credit is failing. Labour will scrap it and implement a social security system that supports people out of poverty and makes work pay.

messages.title: A fair deal for renters
messages.content: Labour will introduce rent controls, secure tenancies, and a charter of renters' rights, giving tenants the protections they need.

messages.title: Loving our High Streets
messages.content: Labour will rejuvenate high streets with free wi-fi, lending for small businesses, and support for local shops.

messages.title: Defend & extend our NHS
messages.content: Labour will defend our NHS and extend its services, including free personal care for the elderly.

messages.title: Put it to the people
messages.content: Labour will give the people the final say on Brexit, with a vote between Remain and a fair Leave option.

messages.title: Cat demands action on The Climate Emergency
messages.content: Labour aims to tackle the climate emergency by planting a million trees, funding public transport, and committing to net zero emissions by 2030.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will scrap Universal Credit and implement a supportive social security system that helps people out of poverty and ensures work pays.
Labour will implement rent controls, secure tenancies, and a renters' rights charter for tenant protection.
Labour will rejuvenate high streets with initiatives like free wi-fi, small business loans, and local shop support.
Labour will protect and expand NHS services, including free personal care for the elderly.
Labour will offer a public vote on Brexit with options to remain or a defined leave option.
Labour will address the climate crisis by planting trees, investing in public transport, and pursuing carbon neutrality by 2030.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will put the Brexit decision back to the people for a final vote between Remain and a defined Leave option.
issues.environment: Labour will address climate change by planting a million trees and aiming for net zero emissions by 2030.
issues.health: Labour will defend and extend the NHS, including providing free personal care for the elderly.
issues.transport: Labour will fund public transport to help reduce carbon emissions.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour will introduce rent controls, secure tenancies, and a charter of renters' rights.

community.content: Labour will rejuvenate high streets with free wi-fi, loans for small businesses, and support for local shops.
